abstract.para: &product; is a highly scalable, high-performance parallel computing platform for modeling, simulation, and advanced analytics workloads.

sect1.title: Components provided
sect1.para: &product; &this-version; provides tools and libraries related to &hpc;. This includes:

listitem.para: A tool for discovering the machine hardware topology
A tool for monitoring memory errors
A tool for determining the CPU model and its capabilities (x86-64 only)
A user-extensible heap manager capable of distinguishing between different kinds of memory (x86-64 only)
Serial and parallel computational libraries providing common standards, such as BLAS, LAPACK, and others.
Serial and parallel libraries for the HDF5 file format

sect1.title: Hardware platform support
sect1.para: &product; &this-version; is available for the Intel 64/AMD64 (x86-64) and AArch64 platforms.

sect1.title: Support and life cycle
sect1.para: &product; &this-version; is supported throughout the life cycle of &sle; &this-version;. Two life-cycle extensions, Extended Service Overlap Support (ESPOS) and Long Term Support Service (LTSS), are also available for this product. Any released package is fully maintained and supported until the availability of the next release.
For more information, see the Support Policy page at .
